LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburiedBleedingHeart.stages: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. I can't stop thinking about it. How can we allow them to rot out there like that?
LanguageData.NakedPrude.stages.0.label: naked
LanguageData.NakedPrude.stages.0.description: I'm naked. Everyone's staring at me! PLEASE GET ME SOME CLOT[PAWN_pronoun]S!
LanguageData.WorkingPassion.stages.0.label: working passionately
LanguageData.PanicAttack.stages.0.label: having a panic attack
LanguageData.PanicAttack.stages.0.description: Get away from me! I need to breathe!
